taskAnalysis.title: Implement Enhanced Layout System with Responsive Design
taskAnalysis.reason: Complex responsive layout implementation requiring Ink.js advanced features, cross-platform testing, and visual hierarchy design

taskAnalysis.title: Add Keyboard Navigation and Focus Management
taskAnalysis.reason: Comprehensive keyboard navigation system requiring focus management, accessibility compliance, and complex interaction patterns

taskAnalysis.title: Integrate TaskMaster CLI with Data Caching
taskAnalysis.reason: Complex async integration with external CLI, caching strategy, error handling, and real-time data synchronization

taskAnalysis.title: Create Interactive Task Detail Views
taskAnalysis.reason: Complex UI components with drill-down navigation, data visualization, and interactive elements

taskAnalysis.title: Implement Multi-Epic Context Management
taskAnalysis.reason: Complex state management for multiple contexts, epic switching logic, and data isolation

taskAnalysis.title: Add Analytics Dashboard with Complexity Reports
taskAnalysis.reason: Analytics implementation with data visualization, chart rendering in terminal, and statistical analysis

taskAnalysis.title: Implement Progressive Mode System
taskAnalysis.reason: Moderate complexity mode switching with preference management and state transitions

taskAnalysis.title: Enhanced Error Handling and Fallback Systems
taskAnalysis.reason: Comprehensive error handling across multiple integration points and graceful degradation

taskAnalysis.title: Performance Monitoring and Optimization
taskAnalysis.reason: Performance monitoring implementation, optimization strategies, and memory management

taskAnalysis.title: Comprehensive Help System and Documentation
taskAnalysis.reason: Documentation and help system implementation with moderate complexity

expansionPriority.reason: Core integration complexity with highest risk
Base layout system required for all other components
Complex state management but well-defined scope
Performance critical but can be implemented incrementally
UI complexity manageable with proper planning
Analytics features can be built incrementally
Error handling can be added incrementally

developmentPhases.name: Foundation
developmentPhases.description: Establish core layout and navigation infrastructure

developmentPhases.name: Integration
developmentPhases.description: Implement TaskMaster integration with robust error handling
